name: Freesia Bouquet (Event)
description: A bouquet of freesias which implies innocent naivety. If used against a chaotic character or a character whose name is purple, your name will turn purple. Can also be used on Event Manager Freya in town

name: Baby Breath Bouquet (Event)
description: A bouquet of gypsophila which implies sorrow. If used against a chaotic character or a character whose name is purple, your name will turn purple. Can also be used on Event Manager Freya in town

name: Pink Lady (Event)
description: A cocktail dedicated to the heroine of the play <Pink Lady> in a celebration of its success, which was first performed on the stage in London in 1912. If used against a chaotic character or a character whose name is purple, your name will turn purple. Can also be used on Event Manager Freya in town

name: June Bug (Event)
description: A cocktail with fresh color of summer green and sweet fragrance, which reminds of bugs flying from flower to flower following the scent in the month of June. If used against a chaotic character or a character whose name is purple, your name will turn purple. Can also be used on Event Manager Freya in town

name: Soft Cheesecake (Event)
description: A gourmet cheesecake that is soft like a souffl√© and delightfully sweet. If used against a chaotic character or a character whose name is purple, your name will turn purple. Can also be used on Event Manager Freya in town

name: Freshly-Baked Baguette (Event)
description: A freshly-baked baguette that is soft and delicious unlike its tough look. If used against a chaotic character or a character whose name is purple, your name will turn purple. Can also be used on Event Manager Freya in town

name: Sweet Cream Bun (Event)
description: A cream bun that features sweet and soft custard cream made of egg yolk, instead of normal butter cream or whipped cream. If used against a chaotic character or a character whose name is purple, your name will turn purple. Can also be used on Event Manager Freya in town

name: White Day Candy (Event)
description: A cute looking candy perfect for a gift. If used against a chaotic character or a character whose name is purple, your name will turn purple

name: Freya's Gift
description: Gift box containing Freya's heart

name: Transformation Scroll: Anakim
description: Scroll that changes your appearance into that of Anakim for 30 minutes. Cannot be traded, dropped, or stored in a private store. Can be stored in a private warehouse

name: Transformation Scroll: Zaken
description: Scroll that changes your appearance into that of Zaken for 30 minutes. Cannot be traded, dropped, or stored in a private store. Can be stored in a private warehouse

name: Ribbon Hairband
description: A large ribbon hair accessory. Exclusive to females. Takes up two hair accessory slots. Cannot be traded, dropped, or stored in a private store. Can be stored in a private warehouse

name: Refined Wizard Hat
description: Refined Wizard Hat. Uses 2 hair accessory slots. Cannot be exchanged or dropped. Cannot use a private store. Can be stored in a private warehouse

name: Refined Jester Hat
description: Refined Jester Hat. Uses 2 hair accessory slots. Cannot be exchanged or dropped. Cannot use a private store. Can be stored in a private warehouse

name: Refined Romantic Chapeau
description: Refined Romantic Chapeau. Uses 2 hair accessory slots. Cannot be exchanged or dropped. Cannot use a private store. Can be stored in a private warehouse

name: Refined Dapper Cap
description: Refined Dapper Cap. Uses 2 hair accessory slots. Cannot be exchanged or dropped. Cannot use a private store. Can be stored in a private warehouse

name: Refined Angel Ring
description: Refined Angel Ring. Uses 2 hair accessory slots. Cannot be exchanged or dropped. Cannot use a private store. Can be stored in a private warehouse

name: Popped-Out Eye
description: Popped-out eye shaped hat. Uses 2 hair accessory slots. Cannot be exchanged or dropped. Cannot use a private store. Can be stored in a private warehouse

name: Bird Nest
description: Bird nest shaped hair accessory. Uses 2 hair accessory slots. Cannot be exchanged or dropped. Cannot use a private store. Can be stored in a private warehouse

name: Varka Karm (used by Varka Silenos)
description: Karm that represents the Varka race. Uses 2 hair accessory slots. Cannot be exchanged or dropped. Cannot use a private store. Can be stored in a private warehouse

name: Ketra Karm (used by Ketra Orcs)
description: Karm that represents the Ketra race. Uses 2 hair accessory slots. Cannot be exchanged or dropped. Cannot use a private store. Can be stored in a private warehouse

name: Puffy Hat of Friendship
description: Puffy hat created to commemorate your friendship with a friend. Uses 2 hair accessory slots. Cannot be exchanged or dropped. Cannot use a private store. Can be stored in a private warehouse

name: Arrow-Pierced Apple
description: Arrow-pierced Apple. It can be worn on the head. Uses 2 hair accessory slots. Cannot be exchanged or dropped. Cannot use a private store. Can be stored in a private warehouse

name: Fish Hat
description: Interesting hair accessory that looks like a fish. Uses 2 hair accessory slots. Cannot be exchanged or dropped. Cannot use a private store. Can be stored in a private warehouse

name: Purple Viking Circlet
description: Purple Viking Circlet. Uses 2 hair accessory slots. Cannot be exchanged or dropped. Cannot use a private store. Can be stored in a private warehouse

name: Golden Viking Circlet
description: Golden Viking Circlet. Uses 2 hair accessory slots. Cannot be exchanged or dropped. Cannot use a private store. Can be stored in a private warehouse

name: White Sheep Hat
description: White sheep shaped funny hair accessory. Uses 2 hair accessory slots. Cannot be exchanged or dropped. Cannot use a private store. Can be stored in a private warehouse

name: Black Sheep Hat
description: Black sheep shaped funny hair accessory. Uses 2 hair accessory slots. Cannot be exchanged or dropped. Cannot use a private store. Can be stored in a private warehouse

name: Vesper's Mighty Power
description: Increase Physical Attack by 15%, Magical Attack by 20%, and Speed by 10 for 10 minutes. \0

name: Vesper's Critical Damage
description: Increase P. Critical Rate by 15, M. Critical Rate  by 2, and Speed by 10 for 10 minutes. Recovers 5% of the standard short-range physical damage inflicted on the enemy as HP

name: Invincible Vesper
description: Increase Max. Attack Speed by 20%, Casting Spd. by 20%, and Speed by 20 for 10 minutes

name: Special Gift of April Fool's Day (Event)
description: The luckiest person will be given a special fortune box on April Fool's Day. What will be inside?\0

name: Golem Shard Piece
description: Shards obtained by hunting golems. Collect these and bring them to Yasheni

name: Event - Energy of Sprout
description: When used, can feel yourself becoming stronger by the Energy of Sprout for 1 hour. Cannot be exchanged, dropped, or destroyed

name: Event - Pack of Energy of Sprout
description: Event - a wrapped pack containing three Energy of Sprout. Cannot be exchanged, dropped, or destroyed

name: Event - Vitality Replenishing Herb Tea 30 minutes
description: Event - a wrapped pack containing five Vitality Replenishing Herb Tea 30 minutes. Cannot be exchanged, dropped, or destroyed

name: Pack of 10 Noble Enhancement Stones
description: Wrapped pack containing 10 Noble Enhancement Stones\0

name: Scroll: Enchant Weapon (S-Grade) Pack
description: Scroll: Enchant Weapon - a wrapped pack containing 1 S-grade

name: Lesser Giant's Codex - Mastery Pack
description: Lesser Giant's Codex - a wrapped pack containing 1 Mastery

name: Olympiad Treasure Chest
description: Olympiad Treasure Chest cannot be exchanged, dropped, or destroyed
